page.title: 03AKENSHAWBURN COTTAGES
page.content: The two cottages at{Akenshawburn}have been converted from farm buildings sited in an isolated but beautiful part of the Kielder Forest. They are typical of many of the lonely buildings in the area, in that they are now serving a new purpose, connected to the rapid expansion of outdoor activities in education. The cottages are now controlled by{South {Tyneside Local Education Authority} ,and are used by pupils from primary and comprehensive schools,as well as groups from youth organisations. Hill-walking,navigation and orienteering are among activities experienced by those visiting the centre. The area is also a rich environment for field-studies.
